body_html: Yes, you should uninstall your other CUDA installations. Uninstalling and reinstalling Anaconda will get rid of CUDA 8. You will still have some leftover CUDA 7 files that you might want to get rid of too.
body_text: Yes, you should uninstall your other CUDA installations. Uninstalling and reinstalling Anaconda will get rid of CUDA 8. You will still have some leftover CUDA 7 files that you might want to get rid of too.
body: Yes, you should uninstall your other CUDA installations. Uninstalling and reinstalling Anaconda will get rid of CUDA 8. You will still have some leftover CUDA 7 files that you might want to get rid of too.
